channel.title: Projects on Dieter Ladenhauf
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Dieter Ladenhauf

item.title: Cash Phoenix
item.description: Cash Phoenix is an Android/iOS app for tracking your personal expenses.

item.title: Color Swipe
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

item.title: Fitness Tracker
item.description: How to build your own machine learning-enabled fitness tracker? This personal project explores several topics, from microcontroller and sensor hardware, firmware development and machine learning for motion detection.

item.title: Photo Pilot
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.
